llm_res.rule: approve function allows _spender to withdraw from your account multiple times, up to the _value amount. If this function is called again it overwrites the current allowance with _value.

decimals - Returns the number of decimals the token uses - e.g. 8, means to divide the token amount by 100000000 to get its user representation. OPTIONAL - This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
transfer function should throw if the message caller's account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
